content:
Database: inventory_management
System: Inventory Management System
Module: Operations
Purpose: Manages product inventory, stock levels, and warehouse operations

Key Tables:
- products: Master catalog of all products in the system
- inventory: Tracks current stock levels for each product
- warehouses: Information about warehouse locations
- stock_movements: Records all stock movements (inbound, outbound, adjustments)
- product_categories: Hierarchical product categorization

Table: products
Purpose: Master catalog of all products in the system

metadata.database_purpose: Manages product inventory, stock levels, and warehouse operations

Purpose: Master catalog of all products in the system
